page.title: 06HOME LIFE
page.content: I live in a four bedroomed house.Most houses in Portsmouth have 3 bedrooms , and are fitted with modern appliances. eg.central heating,television and stereo units.We have a study because our house has been modernized. In here we keep our B.B.C. computer and our telephone.My father uses this room to work in.We have a dining room and a lounge like most people.Next to the dining room is our kitchen which has also just been modernized.We have a 25 by 15 foot garden and in this is a small lawn,a fish pond,a pear and a plum tree,a small flower border and a garage.We also have a green_house which my father built. (this page was written by Joanne Grinter who goes to Lyndhurst Middle School).
